content: direct pdf download skull hat simple two color bottom-up intarsia hat with a panel to cover the yarn floats on the back uses provisional cast on charted design *i originally published this pattern in march 2007 on my now closed blog here it is again this time as a free download enjoy * this is a cozy winter hat with an inner ear band that provides the warmth of a double layer and serves to cover the floats being the skull motif the inner band is knit at a slightly firmer gauge for improved wind resistance measure gauge on larger needles the pattern is written for a 22 adult size but can be easily sized down using smaller needles and a tighter gauge for a child s sized hat cast on 84 stitches and remove one skull motif repeat for adults or those with large skulls add length in the main colour above the colour work section 5 row add about 1 25 any worsted weight yarn can be used it is possible to knit two complete hats using two balls of yarn by reversing the main and contrast colours for the second hat errata row 11 was missing from the chart and has been added back credit the skull motif and decorative bands are a simplified version of the ones found on the we call them pirates hat please visit www helloyarn com for this free downloadable pattern
